verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] [V: met] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-LOC: in front of the world 's cameras] , [ARGM-LOC: against the backdrop of flags of the United States and North Korea] . The leaders approached each other on a red carpet from separate outdoor hallways at the airy and luxurious Capella Hotel on Singapore 's Sentosa Island .

Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un met Tuesday in front of the world 's cameras , against the backdrop of flags of the United States and North Korea . [ARG1: The leaders] [V: approached] [ARG2: each other] [ARGM-LOC: on a red carpet] [ARGM-DIR: from separate outdoor hallways] [ARGM-LOC: at the airy and luxurious Capella Hotel on Singapore 's Sentosa Island] .
